EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
1. VESSEL, 84 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
   VICINITY 34-00N 014-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
   POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4409,
   39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4796,
   FAX: 39 065 908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1476/12.
